titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Jean Albert Bédé Papers

change.item: XML document instance created by Catherine C. Ricciardi

repository.corpname: Columbia UniversityRare Book and Manuscript Library,

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: Jean Albert Bédé, 1904-1977, was professor of French at Columbia from 1937 until his retirement in 1971.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Notes and drafts for Bédé's writings, notebooks, correspondence, photographs, and research notes for David C. Cabeen's "A Critical Bibliography of French Literature" for which Bédé edited volumes 5 and 6 on nineteenth century literature.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Box 1: Correspondence, personal papers and photographs. Box 2: Notebooks. Boxes 3-8: Manuscripts and drafts of writings. Boxes 9-13: Research notes. Box 14: Lecture notes for the Cabeen bibliography.

controlaccess.head: Subjects
controlaccess.corpname: Columbia University.--Dept. of French and Romance Philology.
controlaccess.persname: Cabeen, David Clark, 1886-1965.--Critical bibliography of French literature.
controlaccess.subject: French literature--19th century.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is located off-site. You will need to request this material from the Rare Book and Manuscript Library at least twenty-four (24) hours in advance to use the collection in the Rare Book and Manuscript Library reading room.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition
acqinfo.p: 1977 Papers Bédé, Jean Albert, (estate of). Gift

custodhist.p: Gift of the estate of Jean Albert Bédé, 1977.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of specific item; Date (if known); Jean Albert Bédé papers; Box and Folder; Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Columbia University Library.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. The RBML maintains ownership of the physical material only. Copyright remains with the creator and his/her heirs. The responsibility to secure copyright permission rests with the patron.

otherfindaid.p: Finding aid in repository and online.

did.unittitle: Lecture notes for the Cabeen bibliography
